intro: Solaria major, commonly known as the sunflower, is a flowering plant in the Asteraceae family. It is characterized by its large, showy yellow petals surrounding a dark褐色 center. The plant is native to North America but has been widely cultivated around the world. Solaria major thrives in full sunlight and well-drained soil. Its tall stem and large leaves make it a popular choice for both ornamental and agricultural purposes.
